channel.title: 667: Auto Restarter.bat/run
channel.description:
I need help making an auto server restarter, every ... amount of time it auto restarts.
What I had so far was:
[code]@echo off title Server Automated Restarter :start set time=12800 start Run.bat :loop cls IF %time% GTR 0 ( set /a time=%time% - 1 set /a min=%time%/60 echo Next Restart In %time% Seconds or %min% Minutes. ping 127.0.0.1 -n 2 > NUL goto loop ) taskkill /f /im java.exe cls goto start[/code]
Doesn't seem to run the server at all
EDIT: Nevermind the run.bat had to literally be named "Run.Bat" lmao silly mistake
